description: This file defines a Python class 'LumaLabTools' that extends a toolkit for video generation using the 'lumaai' library. It includes methods for generating videos from images or prompts, with polling for completion, and handles external dependencies like 'lumaai'.

classes.name: LumaLabTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for generating videos using the LumaAI service, with methods for creating videos from images or prompts, including polling for completion.

methods.name: image_to_video
methods.description: Generates a video from one or two images with a prompt, handling asynchronous polling and adding the resulting video to the agent.

methods.name: generate_video
methods.description: Generates a video based on a prompt, with polling for completion and error handling.
